text_ruling:
Agendas installed faceup with Casting Call are not active (unless
those agendas can be installed faceup through their own abilities). [Official FAQ] [Example agendas that can be installed faceup: [Oaktown Renovation](/en/card/08058),
 [Underway Renovation](/en/card/08077), [Hollywood Renovation](/en/card/08098).]

If the agenda hosting Casting Call is uninstalled, Casting Call is
trashed. [Official FAQ]
